text: Ṣé o ò rí i pé dájúdájú Allāhu rọ ohunkóhun t’ó wà nínú ilẹ̀ fun yín, àti ọkọ̀ ojú-omi t’ó ń rìn nínú agbami odò pẹ̀lú ìyọ̀ǹda Rẹ̀, Ó ń mú sánmọ̀ dání tí kò fi jábọ́ àyàfi pẹ̀lú ìyọ̀ǹda Rẹ̀? Dájúdájú Allāhu mà ni Aláàánú, Oníkẹ̀ẹ́ fún àwọn ènìyàn
